participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable but somewhat reserved in social situations.
participant_1.background: I work in IT and have been at the same company for 15 years. I own a house in Florida. I enjoy American sports. I am a male. I have children and dogs.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Introverted and creative, with a passion for gaming and technology.
participant_2.background: I helped design the game Starcraft. I've an allergy to water. I am a recluse. I'm a famous Twitch streamer. I am working on building a robot to be my body double.

content.text: yeah for sure   what kind of job do you have
I am a recluse. And you?
We are really lucky I guess. Where do you live?
you are very lucky   we live in the city
Ok. I would like to drink some water.
But I have an allergy to water.
i m doing great except for the allergies
I got it. Do you feel all right?
oh   i feel like i am always busy
I have to go now. Thank you for this lovely Conversation.
i am trying i am sorry baby enjoy it is just a conversation
